an10.100:1.1: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo arahattam sacchikatum.
an10.100:1.3: Ragam, dosam, moham, kodham, upanaham, makkham, palasam, issam, macchariyam, manam—
an10.100:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamme appahaya abhabbo arahattam sacchikatum.
an10.100:2.1: Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo arahattam sacchikatum.
an10.100:2.3: Ragam, dosam, moham, kodham, upanaham, makkham, palasam, issam, macchariyam, manam—
an10.100:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamme pahaya bhabbo arahattam sacchikatun”ti.
